tier_1_high_impact_easy.name: Add Drug-Target Interaction Features
tier_1_high_impact_easy.description: Add DrugBank target data as features - the model currently has NO target information, which is why biologics fail
implementation: Download DrugBank targets (free academic license)
Create target-disease compatibility features
Add binary features: shares_target_with_known_treatment
Add target family features (kinase, GPCR, ion channel, etc.)
tier_1_high_impact_easy.why_high_impact: Root cause of biologic failures - model has no target understanding

tier_1_high_impact_easy.name: Add Mechanism of Action Features
tier_1_high_impact_easy.description: Add ATC codes and drug class as categorical features
implementation: Map drugs to ATC therapeutic classes
Add disease-specific mechanism relevance scores
Example: SGLT2 inhibitors → diabetes/heart failure high relevance
tier_1_high_impact_easy.why_high_impact: Provides semantic grouping beyond embedding similarity

tier_2_high_impact_medium_effort.name: Fine-tune Embeddings with Contrastive Learning
tier_2_high_impact_medium_effort.description: Current TransE embeddings are generic - fine-tune for drug repurposing task
implementation: Use Every Cure pairs as positive examples
Contrastive loss: pull known pairs closer, push random pairs apart
Fine-tune only last layer to avoid catastrophic forgetting
Use triplet loss: (drug, positive_disease, negative_disease)

tier_2_high_impact_medium_effort.name: Add ChEMBL Bioactivity Features
tier_2_high_impact_medium_effort.description: Add experimental bioactivity data from ChEMBL
implementation: Download ChEMBL drug-target activities
Create features: IC50/EC50 against relevant targets
Add target family activity profiles
Cross-reference with disease-associated targets
tier_2_high_impact_medium_effort.why_high_impact: Adds real experimental evidence beyond knowledge graph

tier_3_medium_impact_higher_effort.name: Disease-Specific Ensemble Models
tier_3_medium_impact_higher_effort.description: Train separate models for disease categories where we have enough data
implementation: Train cancer-specific model with oncology features
Train autoimmune-specific model with immunology features
Use meta-learner to select model based on disease category
tier_3_medium_impact_higher_effort.why_high_impact: Storage diseases already achieve 83% R@30 - specialize for other categories

tier_3_medium_impact_higher_effort.name: Graph Neural Network on Drug-Disease Graph
tier_3_medium_impact_higher_effort.description: Replace/augment GB with GNN that learns from graph structure
implementation: Build drug-disease-target graph from multiple sources
Train GNN (GraphSAGE or GAT) for link prediction
Ensemble with existing GB model
tier_3_medium_impact_higher_effort.why_high_impact: Captures multi-hop relationships (drug → target → pathway → disease)

quick_wins_today.description: For each prediction, check if similar drugs treat the disease

quick_wins_today.name: Add Disease Similarity Features
quick_wins_today.description: Check if similar diseases are treated by this drug

quick_wins_today.implementation: class_weight='balanced' or sample_weight based on disease rarity
